user.title: Welcome to Smart Cover Automation
user.description:
This integration is installed with default settings.

Please configure covers, weather entity, and automation settings later by clicking the **gear icon** (configure button) on the integration card.

Documentation: https://ha-smart-cover-automation.helgeklein.com/

error.invalid_cover: One or more selected covers are invalid or unavailable.
error.invalid_weather_entity: The selected weather entity does not support daily forecasts.

init.title: Smart Cover Automation - Step 1 of 6
init.description: Select a **weather forecast sensor** and the **covers** to automate (required).

data_description.covers: Select the covers the automation should control (required).
data_description.weather_entity_id: Select a weather entity that supports daily forecasts (required).

data_description.covers_max_closure: Never close more than this to always let some light in (0 = fully closed, 100 = fully open).
data_description.covers_min_closure: Never open more than this to always provide a minimum of shade (0 = fully closed, 100 = fully open).
data_description.manual_override_duration: How long to skip a cover after it has been moved manually (0 = no skipping).
data_description.sun_azimuth_tolerance: Maximum horizontal angle at which the sun is considered to be shining on the window (degrees).
data_description.sun_elevation_threshold: The automation starts operating when the sun's elevation is above this threshold (degrees above horizon).
data_description.temp_threshold: Temperature at which the automation starts closing covers to protect from heat (degrees Celsius).

4.title: Smart Cover Automation - Step 4 of 6
4.description:
Configure the **min/max** positions for each cover (optional). If not set, the global values configured in the previous step will be used.

(0 = fully closed, 100 = fully open)

5.title: Smart Cover Automation - Step 5 of 6
5.description: Enable lockout protection by configuring **window sensors** for each cover (optional). If any window sensor associated with a cover reports that the window is open, the cover won't be closed.

data_description.nighttime_block_opening: When enabled, covers will not open during night hours (when the sun is below the horizon).

data_description.automation_disabled_time_range: When enabled, the automation will not run during the specified time range.
data_description.automation_disabled_time_range_start: Start time of the period when the automation should be disabled.
data_description.automation_disabled_time_range_end: End time of the period when the automation should be disabled.

data_description.close_covers_after_sunset: When enabled, covers will be closed a certain time after sunset.
data_description.close_covers_after_sunset_delay: Time to wait after sunset before closing the covers.
data_description.close_covers_after_sunset_cover_list: Select the covers that should be closed after sunset.

logbook_entry.name: Create logbook entry
logbook_entry.description: Create a Smart Cover Automation logbook entry.

entity_id.name: Cover entity
entity_id.description: Cover entity ID for the logbook entry.

verb_key.name: Verb key
verb_key.description: Translation key describing the movement verb.

reason_key.name: Reason key
reason_key.description: Translation key explaining why the cover moved.

config_entry_id.name: Config entry ID
config_entry_id.description: Optional config entry ID to route the logbook entry to a specific integration instance.

template_cover_movement.name: {verb} {entity_id} to {reason}. New position: {position}%.
template_cover_movement.description: Template string used when rendering the logbook entry; supports {verb}, {entity_id}, {reason}, and {position} placeholders.

verb_opening.name: Opening
verb_opening.description: Translation used when the cover is opening.

verb_closing.name: Closing
verb_closing.description: Translation used when the cover is closing.

reason_heat_protection.name: protect from heat
reason_heat_protection.description: Reason used when the cover moves to protect the room from heat.

reason_let_light_in.name: let light in
reason_let_light_in.description: Reason used when the cover moves to let more light inside.

reason_close_after_sunset.name: protect privacy at night
reason_close_after_sunset.description: Reason used when the cover closes automatically after sunset.

set_lock.name: Set Cover Lock
set_lock.description: Lock all covers in a specific state to prevent automation from moving them. Useful for weather emergencies (hail, storms) or manual override scenarios.
